 Transformations performed:

 * Colorize (magick) -> Color: #15ae05 | Opacity 54% 
 * Quantize (magick) -> Max Colors in Image: 10 
 * Median (magick) -> Pixels: 41 
 * Modulation (magick) -> Brightness: 104 | Saturation: 136 | Hue: 52
